name: Lonely Hai
description:
Description

A simple sailing game where you collect resources and explore the vast ocean. Learn actual sailing physics in order to survive as long as you can in the vast ocean. Sail to grab resources to upgrade your ship. Manage your sails so you can grab the wind but watch out since it may cause repercussions as well!

Instructions

W - Sail Down (Speed Up)

S - Sail Up (Slow Down)

A - Rotate Boat Left

D - Rotate Boat Right

Q - Rotate Sail Left

E - Rotate Sail Right

F - Open Crafting Menu

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - Select 

SPACE - Drop Anchor

MOUSE MOVE - Control Camera

MOUSE WHEEL - Zoom in and out
